translation.de: - Bist du aufgeregt? - Ich bin total außer mir.

translation.en: This is going to be some night.
Come on. Come on.
-Dr. B, how's it going? -Very well, thank you.
translation.de: - Dr. B, wie geht's? - Sehr gut, danke.

translation.en: Always a thrill. Right this way.
Where the hell's a spot? Where's a spot?
Whoa! Watch it, man!
Your attention, please.
Before tonight's National Anthem...
...Metropolitan Opera star Robert Merrill...
...will present a special moment for two special people.
translation.de: einen besonderen Anlass für zwei Menschen.

translation.en: I love when they do this.
-Good. -Ladies and gentlemen, Robert Merrill.
What the hell do you think you're doing?
Wait, don't I know you?
-Come on. -Where's your German accent?
translation.de: - Nein. - Wo ist der deutsche Akzent?

translation.en: You have me confused with somebody--
I wanna get on the field. I'm a fan of Mr. Merrill's.
translation.de: Ich will aufs Feld. Bin Merrill-Fan.

translation.en: -There's no fans allowed on that field. -Galaxia.
It's Gary.
Whatever. Someone else will marry my woman if you don't let me go.
translation.de: Jemand wird mein Mädchen heiraten, wenn ich da nicht hinkomme.

translation.en: -Hebrew Melvin's in love. -Very much.
translation.de: - Jude Melvin ist verliebt. - Und wie.

translation.en: I can't stop love.
-Go. -Thank you.
Don't think I don't owe you a couple smacks, by the way.
translation.de: Glaube nicht, dass ich dir dafür Küsschen gebe.

translation.en: Good evening. Tonight, romance comes to Yankee Stadium.
translation.de: Guten Abend. Heute wird es romantisch im Yankee Stadium.

translation.en: Oh, my God, it's Dave.
translation.de: Oh mein Gott, da ist Dave.

translation.en: What the heck are you doing here?
-I wanna borrow this for a second. -That's my mike!
Linda? Where are you?
Don't move.
Linda? Are you out there, honey?
Linda, I'm not mad at you.
Oh, shit.
I know that crazy man brought you here.
translation.de: Du bist mit dem Irren hier, ich weiß.

translation.en: Davey's going crazy!
I've done crazier stuff than that to win back a chick.
translation.de: Habe für 'ne Tussi noch Verrückteres getan.

translation.en: Once I ran naked through a subway station.
translation.de: Bin mal nackt durch die U-Bahn-Station gerannt.

translation.en: How was that supposed to work? I guess I never really thought it through.
translation.de: - Was sollte das denn bringen? - War wohl nicht ganz durchdacht.

translation.en: I gotta tell you something personal!
translation.de: Ich muss dir was Privates sagen!

translation.en: This kid lost his marbles.
I'm over here!
Linda, think about what you're doing to us.
translation.de: Linda, was machst du mit uns?

translation.en: Sweet tackle.
Dave just got leveled!
-Nobody messes with my microphone. -I'm sorry.
translation.de: - Keiner klaut mir mein Mikrofon. - Tut mir Leid.

translation.en: -Everything all right, Buddy? -Oh, yeah.
I've never seen you so excited.
It's not every day a man gets to propose marriage...
translation.de: Nicht jeden Tag macht ein Mann einer Frau...

translation.en: ...to the woman he loves.
Now, here's what I want you to write on the scoreboard.
Linda! Linda, I've loved you since the day I met you!
translation.de: Linda! Linda, ich habe dich immer geliebt!

translation.en: I won't let you do this to us!
Don't marry him!
Don't marry him!
-Wait! -Hey, it's Mayor Giuliani!
Let this man finish what he came here to say.
Let the man back in.
-Who was that guy? -I think it's Bill Clinton.
translation.de: - Wer ist das? - Ich glaube, Bill Clinton.

translation.en: Thank you, Mayor Giuliani. You're the man, by the way.
translation.de: Danke, Herr Giuliani. Sie sind ein Ass.

translation.en: This clown better hurry up. My arm's starting to ice over.
translation.de: Der soll sich beeilen. Mein Arm vereist.

translation.en: Chill, Rocket. Goosfraba.
I can understand why you wanted to see other people. I really can.
translation.de: Ich verstehe, warum du andere Männer wolltest. Wirklich.

translation.en: Buddy Rydell is a psycho!
But he was right about one thing.
translation.de: Aber er hatte in einem Recht.

translation.en: I was an angry guy.
Mainly angry at myself...
...for letting people treat me like crap all the time.
translation.de: weil mich alle wie Dreck behandeln durften.

translation.en: But I don't want to be that angry guy anymore.
translation.de: Aber ich will das nicht mehr.

translation.en: I wanna change.
If you give me a chance...
...I can show you that I got the guts to stand up for what I believe in.
translation.de: und ich werde ab jetzt das verteidigen, woran ich glaube.

translation.en: And I believe in us, Linda.
I love you with all my heart, and I know you love me back.
translation.de: Ich liebe dich sehr, und ich weiß, du liebst mich auch.

translation.en: I should be your husband...
...not that weirdo.
I want to have a family with you. I want to have kids with you.
translation.de: Ich will eine Familie mit dir. Ich will Kinder von dir.

translation.en: Kids who have your eyes...
...and your lips...
...and my...
...last name. That's all I wish on them.
Please marry me, Linda.
Before I make my decision, you have to do something for me.
translation.de: Vor meiner Entscheidung musst du etwas für mich tun.

translation.en: You have to kiss me in front of all these people!
translation.de: Du musst mich vor all diesen Leuten küssen!

translation.en: You can do it, David!
Give her a five-second Frencher!
Kiss her, David.
Kiss her, David.
Kiss her, David!
Kiss her, David.
Dave's a dirty boy.
That wasn't so bad, was it?
translation.de: War doch nicht so schlimm oder?

translation.en: I can't believe you actually started to fall for that crazy man.
translation.de: Dass du dich echt in ihn verlieben konntest.

translation.en: Buddy's not such a bad guy.
Congratulations! You just graduated from anger management!
translation.de: Du hast deinen Abschluss in der Anti-Aggressions-Therapie erhalten!

translation.en: I'm glad your car died. The train's romantic.
translation.de: Gut, dass das Auto liegen blieb. Züge sind romantisch.

translation.en: Don't change the subject.
You're telling me the past two weeks of my life was just therapy?
translation.de: Die letzten 14 Tage meines Lebens waren nur Therapie?

translation.en: Well....
Yeah.
I met with Buddy after reading his book...
translation.de: Nachdem ich sein Buch gelesen hatte...

translation.en: ...and I told him about some of the things going on in your life...
translation.de: habe ich ihm von den Sachen erzählt...

translation.en: ...and how upset it was making you and how nuts it was making me.
translation.de: die dich aufregen und mich verrückt machen.

translation.en: He said that he thought he could help, but it would be tough.
translation.de: Er meinte, er könnte helfen, aber es würde hart.

translation.en: So how much of this thing was a setup?
Well, the guy in your seat on the plane, the flight attendant, the judge...
translation.de: Na ja, der Typ auf deinem Platz, die Stewardess, der Richter...

translation.en: ...they're all friends of Buddy's.
What about the air marshal who tasered me? Was he in on it?
translation.de: Und die fiese Flugaufsicht? Der auch?

translation.en: No, he was just having a bad day.
Son of a bitch.
Skipper, how you doing?
Buddy Rydell, you're a great man.
I was just doing my job. I never doubted you for a minute.
translation.de: Ich tat nur meinen Job. Habe nie an Ihnen gezweifelt.

translation.en: Except when Galaxia had ahold of you.
Did you just call that guy Buddy Rydell?
A guy named Buddy Rydell left this card...
translation.de: Ein Buddy Rydell ließ seine Karte...

translation.en: ...on what's left of my Lexus!
Oh, yeah. For insurance purposes.
Your insurance was canceled!
Don't point that gun at Buddy. I'm the one who smashed your car up.
translation.de: Zielen Sie nicht auf Buddy. Ich war es.

translation.en: -Dave?! -No!
I'm sick of guys like this.
You wanna mess with my friends, shoot me first.
-Don't! -Are you crazy?
Settle down.
Butt out! Tough guy's going to learn a lesson.
translation.de: Mr. Supermann muss noch dazu lernen.

translation.en: I'm not afraid. Dr. Rydell taught me not to be afraid of anybody.
translation.de: Dank Dr. Rydell habe ich vor niemandem mehr Angst.

translation.en: Can I ask you a question, though?
Got you!
Dr. B, Davey just pulled a joke on us!
translation.de: Dr. B, Davey hat uns reingelegt!

translation.en: And how does that make you feel, Lou?
translation.de: Und wie fühlen Sie sich dabei, Lou?

translation.en: We were just doing a joke. That's my friend.
translation.de: War nur Spaß. Das ist ein Freund.

translation.en: Are you okay?
He feels stunning.
